title: Trump Campaign Adviser, Kimberly Guilfoyle
itunes:title: Trump Campaign Adviser, Kimberly Guilfoyle
description:
Gusts include:

 Sarah McGregor, Bloomberg News U.S. Economic Policy Team Leader

Erik Wasson, Bloomberg News Congressional reporter

David Livingston, Deputy Director, Climate and Advanced Energy @ the Atlantic Council, former staffer at USTR and the World Trade Organization.

Kimberly Guilfoyle, Trump 2020 Presidential Campaign Senior Adviser.

They discussed the possibility of Mexico tariffs, market implications, and impeachment.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
